channel.title: Trade
channel.description: Exception encountered while parsing incoming packets from Lol1234. java.lang.NullPointerException at client.parseIncomingPackets(client.java:12839) at client.packetProcess(client.java:19063) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:279) at process.run(process.java:23) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619) this is what happens when u trade and hit declien it logs u out how do i fix it ???? does anybody got a tutorial on how to make players use my client and my client only i got my client uid but where do i put it in server???

item.title: Trade
item.dc:creator: @blacksabath blacksabath
item.description:
@blacksabath wrote:

Exception encountered while parsing incoming packets from Lol1234.
java.lang.NullPointerException
at client.parseIncomingPackets(client.java:12839)
at client.packetProcess(client.java:19063)
at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:279)
at process.run(process.java:23)
at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619)
this is what happens when u trade and hit declien it logs u out how do i fix it ???
does anybody got a tutorial on how to make players use my client and my client only i got my client uid but where do i put it in server???
